discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
Great! But even if the CI does not seem to show a single failure, this change is not backward compatible, so I'm a little bit hesitant to approve. It could be make backward compatible at the cost of naming the new (generalized) lemma slightly differently (e.g. `take_take_min`, or just `take_min` swapping the RHS and LHS of the equality).
@thery what do you think?

discussion.author: thery
discussion.comment: @pi8027 oops I've missed that discussion. I know it is a breaking change but don't you think it is more reasonable like this?

commits.author: thery
commits.message: generalize take_take and add take_taker take_takel
